website_summaries.verdict: Offers some unique settings not found in other convection microwaves and doesn't cost any more than many other units.
pros: Features microwave, grill, convection, and air-fry modes along with 9 presets
Includes a Teflon pan for the grill and air-fry modes
The grill mode can be used alone or with the microwave function
cons: The air fryer is just okay and doesn't work as well as a separate air fryer

customer_reviews.title: Convection oven takes way to long to cook food and air fryer just bakes the food.
customer_reviews.text: absolutely awful purchase. The convection oven would not cook the food...took sooo long you would use way too much electricity...the air fryer is a joke ...it bakes the food...the only thing that worked was the microwave but it was too complicated to use for what it was worth..we sent it back in a week and bought a real microwave. I would advise anyone not to buy this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works but you will always need a manual
customer_reviews.text: Positive is that it is a convection microwave and can cook amazing dishes and it is $250 with a reasonable footprint. Negative is that this is impossible to operate without the manual and I am not kidding about that. I am not talking about using the manual until you get used to it what I am saying is that you will need it for the duration of owning the unit. This might be a bit much for most people to be honest and the interface will probably anger many of the people that buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin17

customer_reviews.title: Kinda loud
customer_reviews.text: My only real complaint are, it's a bit loud. It's actually as loud as the one that this one replaced because it got noisy one day and I figured it was on its way out. Also a little complicated but there's a learning curve with anything like this. One other thing of note, the clock only displays in military time! I HATE doing math in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Wiseoldman

customer_reviews.title: Consumers beware!
customer_reviews.text: Stop working today! First the customer service is the worse. Fiberware no longer exists. There are four other companies that purchased the rights to use the name to manufacture products. That’s the way of the world these days. Thanks Amazon for your great customer service for full refund. This was an expensive piece of JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this unit zero stars, I would. Have had it but a few months, and already, the functions do not work... microwave doesn't heat, nor does turntable spin; air fryer function never worked & convection oven function didn't work for something as simple as baking cookies. Waste of money, and I can't even return it, as the window for returns or repairs has closed. I should've opened my Christmas gift to use it sooner, but my kitchen wasn't ready...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Farberware says they do not make a Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be a Micro Convection oven and loved the addition of the grill and air fryer. I wanted this to go in an RV with limited space. On receiving this called FARBERWARE and was told them they do not have a convection oven and do not support it. I promptly returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Barton

customer_reviews.title: GREAT UNIT!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I ranked 3 star on ease of use because many of the selections are in codes so you will need to manual to refer to. I ended up downloading a .pdf of the manual from Home Depot, printing several pages, and laminating them to keep in a cabinet near the oven for quick reference. I would rather have all the preprogrammed cooking options than not. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesn't do all that it says it will do
customer_reviews.text: This is the most complicated unit to use that I have ever had, the air fry is way to slow, tried to bake a cake( that was a disaster) , didn't cook all the way, Basically not a good replacement for my air cooker, or microwave. Don't waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent combination of microwave, air-fryer- and oven
customer_reviews.text: Excellent combination of microwave, air-fryer- and oven. You could easily used as microwave or oven or air-fryer. Looks great. I have it for one month in replacement of Microwave and convection oven and it does great job. My wife loved i
customer_reviews.author: M T Shata

customer_reviews.title: Love this microwave/ grill/ convection oven
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave/ grill/ convection oven. Just wish instruction book was a little more informative as far as cooking times with each different method.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: so it is highly recommended it have plenty of air
customer_reviews.text: Lots of features! The air fryer does heat up quite a bit....so it is highly recommended it have plenty of air circulation
customer_reviews.author: Janet Warner

customer_reviews.title: So far? Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Microwave, convection, grill, timer - these are a few of my favourite things. Haven't tried the Air Fryer feature yet but if it's like all the other features, it will be great. Still getting used to the settings so the manual isn't far away but we LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Congram

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little adjusting to instruct tons but works great.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Performed as expected.....for a while
customer_reviews.text: This unit works well and I was pleased with operation, but I am giving a 3 star rating because after about 6 weeks of what I consider light use, the light inside went out and the unit started sounding “labored” when it was running. I discontinued use and contacted their customer service. They are sending a replacement. Unfortunately, that replacement is quoted as taking 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: sinner

customer_reviews.title: Microwave and convection cookong with added bonus of air fry and grill
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to replace old one that died on a boat. Needed to fit in certain size cut out and this fit perfectly. Works good also
customer_reviews.author: sea ray 86

customer_reviews.title: Makes my job easier
customer_reviews.text: Works better than any other microwave I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Susann

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money on this one!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. bad as a microwave and as an oven.
customer_reviews.author: tram pham

customer_reviews.title: Not for faint-hearted. Burned tater tots with suggested time.
customer_reviews.text: Product has no timed buttons/numbers. Military time no problem as we have time on stove next located near product. Terrible for toast; had to crowd countertop with toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne MarieAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: I really like the microwave it is just hard to remember all the different settings. Have to constantly refer to the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very big and very heavy
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter, she loves it
customer_reviews.author: tina young

customer_reviews.title: Ecstatic
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave enough about this product. I have never been excited about a microwave before, but this time I am. I've tried the combination grill feature and it works well. Had purchased another brand previously and had trouble with all, but this one is a winner. Used the potato feature and it baked perfectly--best ever--and the defrost does a good job. The controls initially take a bit of getting used to, but once accustomed to them, they also can't be beat. The unit itself looks quite elegant. I am ecstatic with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The microwave function is fine but the other "features" are more trouble than they're ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this and it arrived with a big dent in the side and missing pieces. Ordered a replacement and it has a big dent on the top. The microwave function is fine but the other "features" are more trouble than they're worth. Just buy a regular microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Erinegill

customer_reviews.title: hard to operate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a microwave and a countertop convection oven. the fact that it did air frying was a bonus. I kick myself dally for buying this piece of junk. it is hard to program and takes twice as long to cook something in this as it does in any other oven. the inside of the oven is small and everything has to fit on the turntable. my best advice is save your money , wish I had.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Stone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Advertised as new and arrived with a taped up cord like it had been repaired by last owner. Returning asap
customer_reviews.author: Tina Olszewski

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Does not operate like other plain microwaves. Air fryer is slow. Takes a while to learn all the ins and outs- and there are many. Also gets very hot on outside when used in any oven type modes. Would like to go back to plain microwave- other features not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Katz

customer_reviews.title: or if this microwave just isn't any good, but my turntable does not work right and ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a lemon, or if this microwave just isn't any good, but my turntable does not work right and it doesn't heat right.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D. 96

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our oven came with a small cosmetic dent in the top corner but didn’t show so we can live with it. It took a little getting used to but works great and I like the LED light. The most irritating thing is it shows Military time. We’ve tried to change it but it always changes back.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilkes

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS, READ ALL THE REVIEWS
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. First, it’s Military time only. It takes forever to make a frozen pizza (was 8 minutes longer then last microwave) AND—- here’s the biggy, used it 3X’s and the glass tray no longer turns. Got this 1 1/2 weeks ago and returned it this morning. Do not purchase this, I should have paid more attention to all the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: This microwave does so many things! I loved that about it. The air fryer was wonderful. It took a little getting used to before I got to know all the buttons. My only complaint is that it only lasted 2 years before the tray stopped spinning.
customer_reviews.author: K. Waite

customer_reviews.title: Large unit, versatile, works well
customer_reviews.text: This is a large microwave, so be sure to check the measurements to be sure it fits your space. It is exactly what I wanted, and I've enjoyed using it.
customer_reviews.author: Libbie Kent

customer_reviews.title: Works great but Needs breathing room
customer_reviews.text: We have limited space on board. Works great but needs 12 inches above and 3 inches on sides
customer_reviews.author: D. Gower

customer_reviews.title: ... replaced my microwave and toastmaster and fry daddy yep love
customer_reviews.text: this thing replaced my microwave and toastmaster and fry daddy yep love it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven I love the convection air fry option and I also love the microwave
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Versatile (heavy) for people living in very small spaces like a studio apartment or dorm room
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy duty microwave that is capable of convection microwaving, air frying, and grilling. It is a big (and very heavy) microwave that takes up quite a bit of space on the counter. Because it offers so many different types of cooking, it is a little complicated to work. There is definitely a learning curve that requires some time studying the manual. However, if you take the time to learn how to use it, it becomes a very versatile kitchen appliance. Because of its versatility, this is a great appliance for people who live in very small spaces, like a studio apartment or a dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: great fries, wings and popcorn
customer_reviews.text: this is a great cooker.... so far, its done a GREAT job on... Popcorn - follow the directions chicken wings, crispy, but not dry! and my FAV... french fries, superb! they are crispy, but NOT dry... that is not easy in a toaster oven! just for these items, I am HAPPY... on the downside... a bit small... and, very noisy, but all in all, for these foods cook the BEST!
customer_reviews.author: funbear

customer_reviews.title: This microwave keeps tripping circuit breaker, even when on dedicated outlet
customer_reviews.text: Farberware microwave is only 1000 watts, yet it often trips the circuit breaker, though no other appliance is connected to the same outlet. When I contacted Farberware, they wanted me to cut the cord and send them a picture of microwave with cord cut and then wait from four to six weeks to receive a replacement. I don't trust that replacement will work any better, and don't want to be without a microwave for over a month. Lousy customer service. Defective product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cooks a pizza just like an oven. Microwave part works great. I have gotten the air fryer function down but I'm pretty sure that's a problem with the cook.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived damaged. Sending back for refund. Huge gash in side of box and massive dent in the back side of microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Farberware Gourmet FMO10AHSBKA
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost, the microwave is small. Very, very small. The air fryer portion works, but it's still nothing even close to deep frying. Easy pass.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Kilpatrick

product_meta.title: Farberware FMO10AHSBKA Countertop with Healthy Air Fry and Grill/Convection Function, 1.1 Cu. Ft, Black
product_meta.description: The Farberware Gourmet 1.0 Cubic Foot 1500 Watt Microwave Oven with Healthy Air Fry, Grill, and Convection Function offers unmatched features with a touch of style. The Farberware Gourmet line offers state-of the-art technology for home chefs looking for the next level in multi-purpose functionality. With 9 Healthy Air Fry cooking menus the whole family will be able to cook their healthy meal of choice. Grill up your favorite vegetables or steaks with its unique Grill function. Amenities such as +30-Seconds control button, Interior LED lighting, and 10 power control levels take the guesswork out of food prep. 10 Auto cooking programs allow you to heat up every day items in seconds. Additional features include an LED display as well as a child safety lock function to prevent accidental operation.
feature_bullets: 4 Output Options - Microwave (1000 Watts), Grill (1150 Watts), Convection (1500 Watts), and Healthy Air Fry with 9 fry cooking menus

Unique Grill Function can be used alone or in combination with the microwave to perfectly reheat a slice of pizza, brown a grilled cheese sandwich, or toast an English muffin. The combination function keeps food juicy on the inside and crispy on the outside
Healthy Air Fry Technology uses just a drop of oil to cook up crispy foods like French fries and chicken fingers without the need to deep fry
10 Power Levels & Multi-Stage Cooking allow for adjustable power and perfect heating
This Farberware Gourmet model features a sleek whole glass door design and Sensor Touch Control Panel with easy-to-use dial controls.Turntable Diameter- 12.4 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars78 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
